          <title>
            <string language="no">Hjernespill - enkel</string>
            <string language="en">Braingame - easy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Braingame - einfach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Braingame - facile</string>

          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Et lite, enkelt spill om hjernen der du kan lære litt om plassering til de forskjellige senterene i hjernen.</string>
            <string language="en">A short easy game where you can practise locating the different brain centers.</string>
          </description>
